content.text: The Master of the Waters is a large Sea King that inhabits the waters around Long Ring Long Land.

The Master of the Waters is a giant yellow serpentine Sea King, with red spots and fins on its head and sides. It is huge, as all Sea Kings are. It has a lot of sharp, pointed teeth, two small eyes, a big tongue, and flat nostrils.

He is a renowned problem for passing ships and local folk around Long Ring Long Land. Like other Sea Kings such as Lord of the Coast, he is very aggressive and fierce. Most people who encounter him seem to be very afraid of him.

The Master of the Waters appeared when Tonjit with Shelly wanted to go to the next island to find their friends. Admiral Aokiji helped these two by flash freezing the water along with the monster, so they can walk easily on the ice for about a week. It is unknown if it is still alive or not.

images.caption: Master of the Waters is frozen by Aokiji.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 34 Chapter 319 (p. 11-13) and Episode 227, Kuzan freezes the Master of the Waters and the ocean area surrounding it.
